E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 5/27/1988
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Terry Pendleton



Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1988
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Bryn Smith



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1988
Subject: Willie Mueller injured
Hello Manager,
looks like he worked out a little to intense.
Diagnosis: Strained Calf Muscle.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 3 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Friday, 6/6/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Wally Backman



Date: Thursday, 7/10/1988
Subject: Terry Pendleton healing process
Terry Pendleton is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Eddie Perez is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Date: Monday, 8/11/1988
Subject: Progress of Jeff Branson
Dear Sir,
Jeff Branson has nothing more to prove at A Peoria Chiefs!
He has an AVG of .281 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Team Doctor
